title: I Don't Get Why Everyone Hates DQ
body:
They make the most bitchin' Blizzards.
http://dairyqueenneenahdowntown.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/Blizzard_Large.jpg

replies.body:
Just don't take my CS please

https://www.coldstonecreamery.com/assets/img/products/signaturecreations/signaturecreations.jpg
i died X__X
Dont have one where i live. You have all my hate.
I'll take some of that hate, I have three within five miles.

Everyone knows that Blizzard is one of Riot's main competitors, especially now that Overwatch is out.
Also because Anivia got over-buffed, and that's probably got something to do with blizzards {{champion:34}}
HEADLINE: Memes 'n Games board heroically counters deluge of solo queue threads with epic puns

DQ is awfull, 

http://d1f28u9l1tudce.cloudfront.net/Attachments/NewItems/menu-category-concrete-mixers_20160201025340_0.jpg

Culvers for life
We just got one here, ...their burgers are kind of plain, but yeah, their frosties and stuff are great.

Damn shawty that looks good. We don't have those in our areas but I love me some Sheridan's custard.

http://eatpnw.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Sheridans-Concrete2.jpg

No, FUCK DQ. They don't even use chocolate ice cream for their chocolate blizzards. like
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} WTF kinda bullshit is that

Edit: unless its different in other states. In AZ its nasty ass vanilla for everything. Even the Chocolate xtreme blizzard
*Sigh* I knew I should have made a discussion on this when I thought of this about a month ago

Well it's cause they support blizzard.....

I'm just gonna show myself out of here now
i was waiting for this
They want you to share but I just want to eat my ice cream SOLO
Well Played OP
There's a HOTS/Overwatch joke somewhere in here
Because they are always out of oreos. Fuck dat nonsense.
I needed this
Thank you for bringing happiness to the boards in such dark times.
Yesss. Everytime I read a thread about "DQ" on the boards this keeps popping into my head.
I know, right? DQ is the best thing ever!
Dilly Bar > all

Its because the damn oreo cookies are always clumped at the bottom and I have to go through it all to get the best part 
(Btw its also an analogy of ranked)
